channel.title: Donator Zone/Member Zone
channel.description: I have made a ::donatorzone and I want only people who Donate to be able to use it. I logged into a random account on my server who didn't have any rights or member, and i could go to donate zone. Can someone please tell me how to code in the donator zone so that only members (in the character files) can access it? Thanks!

item.title: Donator Zone/Member Zone
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:23, topic:515839”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=634092.msg4282665#msg4282665 date=1365913494]

You would use the isMember variable for a donor, if a server uses player rights for how donations work then they must be stupid and not know that a variable already exists for such a thing.

Not everyone approaches it this way.
[/quote]

Why would you use a variable for something that it is not for? :P[/quote]
Because that’s the logic of people.
My server doesn’t even have isMember, I made my own variable just like it though.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Zone/Member Zone
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:17, topic:515839”][quote author=GodexCAB link=topic=634092.msg4282583#msg4282583 date=1365903102]

I am using Allstar 317
I’ll try it.

It won’t work then, that command was structured for a PI.
Give me an example of one of your teleport commands and I can get you a new one.

else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("donatorzone")){ //Voule Command Generator teleportToX = 2893; teleportToY = 3510; sendMessage("Welcome to the Donator Zone!"); }

That is my code for donator zone.
[/quote]
Lol you have Voule Command Generator? It should have a player Right option

else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("donatorzone")){ if(playerRights < 4){ sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this command!"); }else if(playerRights == 4){ teleportToX = 2893; teleportToY = 3510; sendMessage("Welcome to the Donator Zone!"); } }[/quote]

Lol, yes I LOVE command gen. it’s awesome, and faster to make a command, lol. Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Zone/Member Zone
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

I hope you know that with java every thing is possible and you can make what int to do what ever you want, runescape just maked the playerRights to be 1 admin 2 mod… idk…
this is wrong:
if (playerCommand.startsWith("::donatorzone") && || if (c.playerRights >= 0)
Its all wrong all the line every word…
if you want a command for every one you don’t need to check if your playerRights is more then 0.
And i am pretty sure you cant do this : && ||

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Zone/Member Zone
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Look, Im not discussing like other do
simple as F*ck

if(playerCommand.startsWith("donorzone") && (isDonator >= 1) { c.startTeleport("2103, 5412, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("You teleported to the Donator Zone"); } else if (c.playerRights == 0 || c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3) { c.sendMessage("You need to be Donator to use this Feature!"); return; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Zone/Member Zone
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Wow. Player ranks can be what ever the hell you want.
If you wanted, you could have playerRights 0 be owner, and 300 be normal. Granted that’d be dumb, but hey, you can.
Assuming his server is typical.
0 player
1 mod
2 admin
3 owner
4+ unassigned.

To answer OP:
Your commands probably have if(playerCommand.startsWith(“command here”) && c.playerRights >= 3)
Look at the bold part.

= is greater than or equal to.
<= is less than or equal to.
== is equal to.

Oh and:
if (playerCommand.startsWith("::donatorzone") && || if (c.playerRights >= 0)
c.getPA().spellTeleport(xxxx, xxxx, x);
return;
is wrong.
it should be similar to:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("donorzone")){//I didn't add rights here because I like to have it send message to players.
     if(c.playerRights < 4){
         c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this command!");
     }else if(c.playerRights == 4){//Notice ==
          c.startTeleport(XPos,Ypos, Height, "modern");//"modern" can be changed to "lunar" and "ancients" on most servers.
     }
}

Read full topic

Yeah 4 is Hidden Admin lol and not entirely sure how cause I’m too tired to think about it but add an exception in the command checking to make sure they’re a donator, like If they’re a donor then they will be able to use the command.

shouldnt be too hard to find.
